item.description: Hiking/gear conditions same as for "Snowshoe Mt Cardigan Sunday 3/4" For 3/11 meet at the Fort truckstop restaurant off I-89 Exit 18 Lebanon NH 9 AM for breakfast. Reserve w/ leader by 5 PM Sat 3/10 for reserved seating; walk-ins welcome but YOYO for seating. Carpool to AT @ 3 Mile Rd near Etna NH, spot cars. Then drive to Goose Pond Road trailhead, hike southbound back to 3 Mile Rd. 5.5 miles, 1300' up to North Peak, down to saddle, 200' up to South Peak, then down to 3 Mile Rd. Limited views but great hike overall, w/ stop at Moose Mtn shelter just N of saddle.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike AT Moose Mtn N>S 5.5 miles
